body.name: GAZHOME Twin XL Bed Frame with 2 XL Storage Drawers, Metal Platform Bed Frame with Footboard, 9 Strong Metal Slat Support/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly/Space Saving (Twin XL)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 49 mins
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 49 mins
features: 🛌【PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS】: Dimension: 81”× 39”× 12.8”, Mattress for 37.8”× 80”.❤️Our Twin XL bed frame has 9 stable legs instead of 6 unstable legs.With 2 metal drawers underneath mounted on moving wheels.Drawers can be placed on the left or right according to your preference.

🛌【STRONG & STURDY METAL FRAME】: The metal frame of this high-quality Bed Frame is made of selected steel. We provide the rubber strip pressed the slats to prevent noise. The steel bars are strong and sturdy, can hold heavy objects and has large load capacity up to 1000 lbs, you don’t need to worry about it getting crooked or even collapsing. The metal frame is also covered with anti-rust finish paint, making the service life even longer.

🛌【SIMPLE & STYLISH DESIGN】: This Bed Frame is widely loved for its rustic, natural and simple appearance and its strong and durable quality. It is perfect for all home decoration styles.The bottom of the bed frame is 11 inches high, and the large capacity can store home, books, etc.

🛌【EASY INSTALLATION WITH HARDWARE KIT】: No need to purchase extra hardware or tools for installing this bed frame, we have included a full installation hardware kit in the package for you, you can finish the installation all by yourself within half an hour! What’s more, there’s also a detailed installation manual that explains every step clearly, making your work much easier.

✔️【GAZHOME, A COMPANY YOU CAN TRUST】— We are a company with years of professional experience in designing, developing and manufacturing furniture with the best quality.Our bed frame is issued by the official Amazon warehouse.If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via Amazon.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Farmhouse Platform Bed Frame GAZHOME Try our best to create the best home for you with a sincere design.
Save Your Room Bed Frame with 2 XL Storage Drawers The 2 storage drawers under the bed make good use of the space underneath, making the whole bedroom look very neat and protecting your privacy
Rustic Style Made of high-quality wood It has greater stability and load-bearing capacity than other bed frames. And it won't give off odor, make your home look new

Anti-noise design Mute slat The mute buckle is used to fix the slats more firmly, which can prevent the noise caused movement. EVA Sponge The EVA material reduces the friction between the slats, which can prevent the noise and extend the life of the storage bed.

Specifications Twin bed Dimension 75”L× 39”W× 12.8”H Twin XL bed Dimension 81"L x 39"W x 12.8"H Package Weight 46.7 pounds Color Brown Install required YES Material Metal & Wood Box Spring Required NO Weight Capacity 1000 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars simple to assemble
reviews.reviewText: simple to assemble , excellent material, lots of space underneath, simple to open and close the drawers! I recommend it for the quality, price and functionality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and simple
reviews.reviewText: The drawers are kinda all over the place, but functional. Feels sturdy. Great guest room or student bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Teenage boy approved
reviews.reviewText: My son is 6’3’’ and he has room to spare with this bed. The drawers are convent storage for everything from hoodies to sweatpants. It was simple to assemble and took less than an hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars looks great, exactly as pictured
reviews.reviewText: works exactly as needed, looks nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not rated for 1000lbs
reviews.reviewText: The bad: absolutely NOT rated for 1000lbs -not that I really expected that, but I did expect it to hold a single ~200lb adult sitting sort of on the edge of the bed. Two of the bars bent immediately with one falling out of its supports. I would assume this would also be no good for a younger child who is inclined to jump on their bed.Less important but still annoying is there is no way for the drawers to stay under the bed without moving if they’re bumped (we have vinyl laminate flooring)The good: assembly was easy enough, frame is lightweight, there were extra of each bolt included in case you lose one while assembling.It’s a nice looking frame and was shipped packaged appropriately to not have damage when it arrived.We will try putting plywood under the mattress to see if it takes the strain off the individual support bars so we don’t have to return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item as describe
reviews.reviewText: This bed was easy to assemble and is very sturdy, looking forward to having long time since is only going to be used when I get visits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nice to look at but very flimsy
reviews.reviewText: November Update: the “support” bars just keep crapping out. They’re pretty much plastic. At this point, we are going to buy a new bed.Original review: This bed looks exactly like the picture. Overall, I love the appearance. Now that it’s been several months owning it, we’ve learned that no one except our 5 year old can sit or lay on it otherwise the “support” bars underneath the mattress will bend. With even the slightest bit of pressure, these bend completely in half so we’ve resorted to flipping the bent ones over so at least the mattress doesn’t fall through and setting a house rule that no one over 65lbs can even look at the bed for fear the bars will bend. I would definitely not buy this again unless it came with triple the amount of support bars (we’ve already been through 5).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Bed for Guest Room
reviews.reviewText: This is an okay bed. The drawers are really just pull out baskets but other than that, it is a good find. It looks good and is sturdy. If you are looking for a super good piece of furniture of high quality, may not be for you. But, if you want a bed that looks good and functions as it should, this is a good product for a good price.
